### Sarah Hu (she/her)

I am a microbial ecologist & biological oceanographer. I am excited about the elaborate & indispensable ecological roles single-celled microbial eukaryotes play in the environment. Raised in Southern California, but currently trying New England.

### education

**PhD 2018** | University of Southern California | Los Angeles, CA

**BS 2011** | University of Washington | Seattle, WA

### professional experience

**Postdoctoral Investigator** | Woods Hole Oceanographic Institution | 2018 - Present

Explore food webs at deep-sea hydrothermal habitats in the [Huber lab](https://www2.whoi.edu/staff/jhuber/projects/), specifically focusing on the role of unicellular eukaryotes. 

**PhD** | University of Southern California | 2012 - 2018

Genetic characterization of microbial eukaryotic diversity and metabolic potential in the Caron lab at USC.
